channel.title: Major Updates, Major help!
channel.description:
Ok, so you guys have helped me get to were i am with my server. It currently has 400+ members so Thanks.
But now its time to do some updates (major updates) and remember, im OK with java but not great.
1. Currently the whole world is PVP, How do i make it so NONE of the world is PVP and its pure just normal. 2. Currently the server has pickup codes, How do i make it so the SERVER NO LONGER has those boring stupid pickup codes and instead i will sell the items in the shops. 3. When someone tries to TRADE it says its been disabled, how do i enable it? 4. I have 3 commands that users can use that i dont want them to (::pure) (::master) (::tank), How do i remove them. Instead of letting users use them i am going to make training areas. 5. Currentlly NO SKILLS are working, how do i get thieving and a few others to work.
Thanks.
I will be online for a while, and will reply to and replys.

item.title: Major Updates, Major help!
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

1: The coordinates are set throughout the whole world, you need to change it to where you want wilderness to be. Client.java
2: Find code[/code] or whatever your command is in client.java, and change rights.
3: It’s disabled, enable it in client.java
4: In client.java, search: public void commands() { and change the rights.
5: Add them yourself or find tutorials on adding them.

Read full topic

item.title: Major Updates, Major help!
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

you have 400+ players playing and you can’t do some of these?
your “ok” when u don’t know the basics of taking out a command?

  1. search for wild coords if thats what u mean.
  2. custom command method in client class.
  3. some where in client class.
  4. read up.
  5. search for some skill names then fix them up.
    look around the forums to find any help on skills if there is no codes in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Major Updates, Major help!
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

Ok, so you guys have helped me get to were i am with my server. It currently has 400+ members so Thanks.

But now its time to do some updates (major updates) and remember, im OK with java but not great.

  1. Currently the whole world is PVP, How do i make it so NONE of the world is PVP and its pure just normal.
  2. Currently the server has pickup codes, How do i make it so the SERVER NO LONGER has those boring stupid pickup codes and instead i will sell the items in the shops.
  3. When someone tries to TRADE it says its been disabled, how do i enable it?
  4. I have 3 commands that users can use that i dont want them to (::pure) (::master) (::tank), How do i remove them. Instead of letting users use them i am going to make training areas.
  5. Currentlly NO SKILLS are working, how do i get thieving and a few others to work.

Thanks.

I will be online for a while, and will reply to and replys.
